Ideia formidável. Jogabilidade, um lixo!

Tem tanta coisa errada, que eu já escrevi, reescrevi essa análise e nem assim consegui ficar satisfeito com o resumo.

Câmeras terríveis, obstáculos ridículos, limitação de movimentação de killer imensa, sobreviventes nem aí com os geradores só jogando lanterna na cara e cagando regra depois quando você também apela, comunidade tóxica pra caralho...

A ideia de jogar com assassinos famosos do cinema e outros games é até legal, mas começa o jogo e a diversão morre aí.

Sincera e honestamente, potencial desperdiçado pra caramba num jogo com mecânica absolutamente quebrada.

I have recently started playing this game and have been enjoying it. But with the new update and addition of the nemesis killer I will probably be uninstalling. Nemesis is completely broken and ruins the game and of course most people choose to use him to exploit that. The zombies camp totems and gens, I have even seen them get stuck on them making it impossible to cleanse/repair them. The tentacle also has an insane reach. I won't be playing again until the issues are resolved.

the only reason i am writing a bad review other than some of the bugs -_- is that their work at ban appeals and support its really lazy they dont even try to look into your issue accounts get hijacked way more than you think. and they are very careless about some players that have dedicated tens and hundreds of dollars and hundreds and thousands of hours. i myself was a victim to this if a guy hacks your account and gets you VAC banned then sucks to be you.  i tried my hardest to appeal (sending proof that my account was hijacked) they say your security is your fault well i tried everything i even put on steam guard. hackers get better everyday, so all i have to say to the people that are reading this keep your accounts safe. go the extra mile because the devs dont care if your account was hacked. well thats a lot of time of my life and a lot of money down the drain especially nowadays when money is scarce so yeah thats about it really. oh and please devs if your somehow SOMEHOW reading this please consider looking more into ban appeals. thank you all for reading this keep your accounts safe. and spirit S tier killer. <3
this game infuriates me. 10/10

I don't say this lightly, as I am a big fan of horror and thriller games, though I generally stick to atmospheric stories, think Lovecraft, Poe, and many of the games I enjoy are often puzzle/adventure/maybe some RPG, that being said sometimes I don't mind a straight up scare game, though I find myself needing adrenaline much less than I used to. Anyway, I really wanted to like this game. I thought the premise behind it seemed like something I 'might' have liked. I'll be honest, this game is mostly about 'cashing in' and less on actual game-play. I would refund it, but having spend so much time trying to get past the awkward and convoluted tutorial, instead of it just showing me, I'm expected to read a whole manual before I even play the game...um no. While, okay I might be willing to do that in single player horror story where I can learn at my own pace. I just am not prepared to do that in a multiplayer setting. I was on the fence about this from the start anyway, and the tutorial proved to me why I was 2nd guessing it. Think you are good at skill checks, even if normally you have good timing, you will not be good at skill checks (thus I imagine in real multiplayer you will become a favorite scapegoat by others if you alert yourself to the killer too many times). Your best friends might not care, but what are the chances you will be playing with your best friends; like you really care that Paris Hilton was killed in that one horror movie kinda way.

Also, think lockers are your friends, well even assuming they worked and you don't get stuck in them...according to what I've read by most players, lockers tend to get you killed quick unless you know what you are doing. I did like the idea this game presented, but it's execution was poor, and if I could refund or gift this to somebody, or a fair trade for something else I totally would, but now I'm more than likely stuck with something I will hardly if ever play, because despite the many number of downloads and buys this game has...I don't feel enough people are getting the 'real' deal about what they are getting into. Some reviews have been straight up honest, from both new players and even veterans who have spend hundreds of hours (I was a newbie to this and probably always will be now). And I imagine maybe if I was willing to sit through all that time (maybe) I might reach some level of knowing the game. But seems like the design flaws itself, there's no cure for that users can control. I don't see why so many people give this game so many positive reviews. I'm all for trying to see the potential of something and being semi-positive when I start on anything, but I believe in being realistic too. By far, this might be the worst purchase I made in awhile and I really wish I could refund it. I have several horror games I was wanting to try, and have on my list that probably would have been better spent just because there was some story or adventure keeping me going. I knew this was multiplayer, so I didn't expect too much, but I just sorta went in blind, hoping I'd find something redeeming, but feeling like I got ripped off. I did read a few reviews and saw many trailers that seemed positive, but I do not feel they are nearly a good judge of every type of player that might come into something like this, and honestly I should have questioned when many of the reviews were blatantly ambiguous, and often times not totally honest. 

I personally think, just taking out skill checks would make the game alot better (and instead maybe add a delay, but the constant failing of checks, and I attempted this multiple times, and have a feel if skill checks are not good then hit boxes will not be good either). The textures and areas are not really what I had hoped they would be. I feel this is just a cash grab game, and honestly when you do see a game that has tons of DLC's, then you kinda know what to expect. A good game would only have a few DLC's if it's story or map content, but reskinning things over and over is a terrible idea, do I like seeing some of the iconic characters from beloved series, sure...but would I rather have a better designed platform and a smoother unbuggy game, yes. I think expanding gameplay or adding more maps is a better use of design. I can see why alot of people might want this game, because so few multiplayer thriller games exist, but honestly I feel most people's time is better spent on more consistent projects, and I wish I had of really researched or played a demo before I bought. Most 'just-plays' always make this game seem great, but I don't find them very 'factual'. Cosmetics can be cool but not if it's eclipsing other elements that should be fixed. I hate leaving a bad review, and normally wouldn't bother if I didn't like something (I'd refund and just not say much, but I went over the limit just trying to learn the basics because sadly I believed the hype), but this was money that I could have put to use with other games, or even other companies I know will at least fix a few things. Sorry to have to leave a bad review (many of my reviews are positive, though like many I often wish a neutral choice applies to some games too), but for me personally I did not enjoy my time with the game). Since I can't return this for something else, now I'm just stuck with something that will end up like Norman Bate's mom, dead but not entirely buried.

интересная игра, комьюнити хорошее, редко ливают клодетки которые берут фонарик, щелкают им перед маном и подыхают после 1 палетлупа. А если ты решил поиграть на мане, то тебя не ждет целый ряд трудностей, например, ожидание миллиард лет, 1-8 ранги фулпати, которые зашли к тебе 20тке на огонек. Допустим ты захотел затестить билд с аддонами, тебя ждет интересный симулятор ожидания послеигрового чата, в котором ты поймешь, что играл ты очевидно очень плохо, с аддонами играют только слабаки, ты все делал не так, да и вообще прожил жизнь ты неправильно. 
за сюрва  тебя ждет не менее интересный геймплей, потому что всегда тима будет спасать тебя, заводить генераторы, шелкать фонариками в 3м, но к сожалению лишь одно из трех.
отличный симулятор ожидания послеигрового чата, но как соревновательная игра huita
